item.title: Tomb Garden of Ael(ius) Iul(ius) Iulianus, Decurion in Romula
item.description: Province Dacia Traiana Province Description Location Romula Romula (Pleiades) Location Description Sublocation Sublocation Description Garden Tomb Garden of Ael(ius) Iul(ius) Iulianus, Decurion in Romula Keywords tombs epitaphs Garden Description A slab unearthed near Resça (Romula), Romania, in 1954 records a verse epitaph set up by Valeria Gemellina for her husband Ael(ius) Iul(ius) Iulianus, a decurion of the colony of Romula, some time probably in the later second or third century.
